tool_description: Synchronizes inventory levels and availability status across multiple supplier systems with real-time updates and conflict resolution.

supplier_systems.description: List of supplier system identifiers to synchronize

sync_frequency.description: Synchronization frequency: real_time, hourly, daily, weekly

conflict_resolution.description: Strategy for resolving inventory conflicts: latest, highest, lowest, average

minimum_threshold.description: Minimum inventory threshold for availability status

enable_backorder.description: Whether to enable backorder status for out-of-stock items

priority_suppliers.description: List of priority supplier IDs for conflict resolution

notification_threshold.description: Inventory level that triggers low stock notifications

error_messages: Invalid supplier_systems: All supplier system identifiers must be valid and accessible.
Unsupported sync_frequency: Use one of [real_time, hourly, daily, weekly].
Invalid conflict_resolution strategy: Use one of [latest, highest, lowest, average].
Invalid threshold values: minimum_threshold and notification_threshold must be non-negative integers.
Sync operation failed: Unable to synchronize with one or more supplier systems.
Priority suppliers not found: One or more priority suppliers in the list do not exist.
usage: Specify supplier_systems and sync_frequency. Configure conflict_resolution, thresholds, and notification settings as needed. Returns synchronization status and inventory summary.

sync_conflicts.description: Number of conflicts encountered during synchronization

low_stock_alerts.description: Number of products below notification threshold

last_sync_timestamp.description: Timestamp of the last successful synchronization

system_health.description: Health status of each connected supplier system
